means: 堕落( deprave的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: In 1766 he excommunicated the village for its "depraved diversion."
sentence.Network_cn: 1766年，他以“堕落地享乐”为由将那个村庄逐出教会。

sentence.Network_en: This is the work of a depraved mind.
She described it as the work of depraved and evil criminals.
sentence.Network_cn: 她认为那是堕落邪恶的罪犯所为。

PerfectNetExp.abs: “堕落”的英文怎么拼？ - 已解决 - 搜搜问问 ... fall into a snare 上当。 ... depraved 堕落的 ... itiate 污染；使堕落.

list.abs: depravation 恶化depraved appetite 食欲倒错depressed fracture 凹陷骨折
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... gravity 严肃，一本正经 depravity 堕落，恶习 longevity 长寿.
蓝宝词典 ... deposit vt. 沉淀n.沉淀，押金 depravity n. 堕落，腐败，邪恶 deprecate vt. 不赞成，贬低.
“全然败坏”（Total depravity）不意味着“完全败坏”（utter depravity）。完全败坏的意思是某人坏到他/她可以坏的最大程度。
 1、全然的堕落（Total Depravity）：罪已经渗透到人的每一个层面，人已经没有任何一个地方没被罪恶所污染。 人的理性、良心 …

entry.tran: 堕落的;腐化的;败坏的;邪恶的
entry.def: Depraved actions, things, or people are morally bad or evil.

example.tran: 令人不安、道德败坏的影片

example.ex: She described it as the work of depraved and evil criminals.
example.tran: 她认为那是堕落邪恶的罪犯所为。

means.word_mean: 3. marked by immorality; deviating from what is considered right or proper or good;

sentences.sentence: "the reprobate conduct of a gambling aristocrat"

auth_sentence.content: Into this depraved world of addiction come electronic cigarettes.
auth_sentence.res_content: Into this depraved world of addiction come electronic cigarettes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Into this depraved world of addiction come electronic cigarettes.

auth_sentence.content: This is shallow and depraved behaviour of the lowest order.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is shallow and depraved behaviour of the lowest order.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is shallow and depraved behaviour of the lowest order.

auth_sentence.content: I was fond of him, as depraved as he was.
auth_sentence.res_content: I was fond of him, as depraved as he was.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I was fond of him, as depraved as he was.
